extendedInfo.description: Make each folder for pictures and videos.Manage folder with color and transparency, if you want to hide some folder for secret. just put password on the folder.Also provide the desktop shortcut for the each foler. you can watch pictures and videos with one click on desktop.* Create the folder After running the app, click the Create Folder button to create. A folder window will appear. select the color and transparency, and enter the name for the folder.  Folder image is from the first picture in a folder. Enter your password when you create a folder * Insert and delete pictures and videos in the foler Select the folder,press the Add File button and select the directory, then press the OK button to choose a file name or picture. Camera folder  is  under the name of DCIM, select the OK button. * Folder Edit / Delete / Create Shortcut Long Press On the folder. * In conjunction with Gallery For slide show, message, E-mail etc. just click the image under the folder. If it is a video, It will play. * Change the theme Click theme button on the first page to change into pink theme or blue theme.
